TypeSignature.Value: public class MessageEnumerator : MarshalByRefObject, IDisposable, System.Collections.IEnumerator
.class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MessageEnumerator extends System.MarshalByRefObject implements class System.Collections.IEnumerator, class System.IDisposable
Public Class MessageEnumerator Inherits MarshalByRefObject Implements IDisposable, IEnumerator
public ref class MessageEnumerator : MarshalByRefObject, IDisposable, System::Collections::IEnumerator
type MessageEnumerator = class inherit MarshalByRefObject interface IEnumerator interface IDisposable

summary.span: 提供一个只进游标，用于枚举消息队列中的消息。

span.span: Provides a forward-only cursor to enumerate through messages in a message queue.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用于 与队列中的消息进行动态交互。Use for dynamic interaction with messages in a queue. 通过 类提供的方法可以返回 指向队列中的消息动态列表的，或返回在调用指定的方法时队列的给定即时快照上包含副本的数组。Methods available through the class can return either a pointing to a dynamic list of messages in the queue, or an array that contains a copy at a given instant - a snapshot - of the queue at the time the specified method was called. 与静态快照不同，枚举器允许您修改集合。Unlike a static snapshot, an enumerator allows you to modify the collection. 使用 ，可以从队列中删除消息，而更改会立即反映在队列中。Using a , you can remove messages from the queue, and the change is immediately reflected in the queue. 枚举器在查询队列时不会从队列中删除消息。An enumerator does not remove the messages from the queue when it queries the queue. 它返回有关当前光标位置处的消息的信息，但它将消息保留在队列中。It returns information about the message at the current cursor position, but it leaves the message in the queue. 是游标，初始化为动态列表的开头。A is a cursor, initialized to the head of a dynamic list. 列表的顺序与消息在队列中的顺序相同，具体取决于消息的优先级。The list order is the same as the order of the messages in the queue, according to message priority. 通过调用，可以将光标移到队列中的第一条消息 。You can move the cursor to the first message in the queue by calling . 初始化枚举器后，可以使用 前进到其余的消息。After the enumerator has been initialized, you can use to step forward through the remaining messages. 可以通过将超时传递到方法来指定是否等待消息变为可用 。You can specify whether to wait for a message to become available by passing a timeout into the method. 由于枚举器是动态的，因此，在游标的当前位置之外追加的消息 (例如，由于低优先级) ，可通过枚举器访问。Because the enumerator is dynamic, a message that is appended beyond the cursor's current position (for example, due to low priority), can be accessed by the enumerator. 无法访问在游标的当前位置之前插入的消息。A message that is inserted before the cursor's current position cannot be accessed. 不可能向后移动 。It is not possible to step backward with a . 游标允许只进移动。A cursor allows forward-only movement. 方法使您能够将游标放回队列的开头。The method enables you to place the cursor back at the beginning of the queue. 给定队列的实例是 独立工作的。Instances of for a given queue work independently. 您可以创建适用于同一队列的两个 实例。You can create two instances that apply to the same queue. 如果第二个枚举器定位在第一个枚举数之前，则会立即在第二个枚举器中反映对队列中的消息所做的更改。The changes that one makes to the messages in the queue will be reflected immediately in a second enumerator if the second enumerator is positioned before the first. 但是，如果两个枚举器具有相同的位置，并且其中一个枚举器删除了该位置的消息，则如果其他枚举器尝试获取 现已删除消息的属性值，则将引发异常。However, if two enumerators have the same position and one of them removes the message at that position, an exception is thrown if the other enumerator attempts to get the value of the property on the now-deleted message. > [!NOTE] > 如果创建的实例 ，并将设置为 `true` ，则在连接到队列时，其他应用程序不能修改枚举器中的消息。If you create an instance of with set to `true`, no other application can modify the messages in your enumerator while you have the connection to the queue. ## Examples 下面的示例获取队列中消息的动态列表，并对属性设置为的所有消息进行计数 。The following example gets a dynamic list of messages in a queue and counts all messages with the property set to . [!code-cpp[MessageQueue.GetMessageEnumerator#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.GetMessageEnumerator/CPP/mqgetmessageenumerator.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[MessageQueue.GetMessageEnumerator#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.GetMessageEnumerator/CS/mqgetmessageenumerator.cs#1)] [!code-vb[MessageQueue.GetMessageEnumerator#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.GetMessageEnumerator/VB/mqgetmessageenumerator.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Close() cil managed

summary.span: 释放与枚举数关联的资源。

span.span: Frees the resources associated with the enumerator.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在游标的生存期内，操作系统会将打开的句柄保留到队列中。The operating system retains an open handle to the queue during the lifetime of the cursor. 使用完枚举器后，调用 以释放与句柄关联的资源。When you have finished working with the enumerator, call to release the resources associated with the handle.

public: property System::Messaging::Message ^ Current { System::Messaging::Message ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取该枚举数指向的当前 。

span.span: Gets the current that this enumerator points to.
The current message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建枚举器后，该枚举数指向第一条消息之前的位置。When the enumerator is created, it points to the head of the queue, at a location before the first message. 在这种情况下，无效， 如果访问，将引发异常。In this case, is not valid and will throw an exception if it is accessed. 您必须调用 以将游标定位到队列中的第一条消息。You must call to position the cursor at the first message in the queue.

exception.span: 您在第一次调用 之前调用了 。

span.span: You called before the first call to .

exception.span: 游标位于消息枚举的第一个元素之前。

span.span: The cursor is located before the first element of the message enumeration.
-or-

exception.span: 您在对 的调用返回 （指示游标位于消息枚举中的最后一个元素之后）之后调用了 。

span.span: You called after a call to had returned (indicating the cursor is located after the last element of the message enumeration.)

exception.span: 枚举数当前所指向的消息不再存在。

span.span: The message the enumerator is currently pointing to no longer exists.

exception.span: 可能已将其删除。

span.span: It might have been deleted.

span.span: Gets the native Message Queuing cursor handle used to browse messages in the queue.
The native cursor handle.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性包含枚举的本机句柄。This property contains the native handle to the enumeration. 使用完枚举器后，调用 以释放此资源。When you have finished working with the enumerator, call to release this resource.

exception.span: 此句柄不存在。

span.span: The handle does not exist.

summary.span: 释放由 使用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用 会允许出于其他目的重新分配所使用的资源 。Calling allows the resources used by the to be reallocated for other purposes. 有关的详细信息 ，请参阅 [清理非托管资源](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged)。For more information about , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged).

span.span: Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources

param.name: disposing
param.span: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 ；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放由 占用的非托管资源，还可以另外再释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法由公共 方法和 方法调用。This method is called by the public method and the method. `Dispose()` 调用受保护的 `Dispose(Boolean)` 方法，并将 `disposing` 参数设置为 `true` 。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. `Dispose`在设置为的情况调用 `disposing` `false` 。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当 `disposing` 参数为 `true` 时，此方法释放该 引用的、由任何托管对象持有的全部资源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法将调用每个被引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 重写 时，请注意不要引用在以前调用 时已释放的对象。

span.span: When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现的详细信息 ，请参阅 [实现 Dispose 方法](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose).

para.span: 有关和的详细 信息 ，请参阅 [清理非托管资源](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged) 和 [重写 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).
Implementing a Dispose method
Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Finalize() cil managed

summary.span: 释放枚举数控制的资源。

span.span: Releases the resources held by the enumerator.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法重写 。This method overrides . 应用程序代码不应调用此方法;在垃圾回收过程中会自动调用对象的 Finalize 方法，除非通过对方法的调用禁用了垃圾回收器终止 。Application code should not call this method; an object's Finalize method is automatically invoked during garbage collection, unless finalization by the garbage collector has been disabled by a call to the method. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Finalize 方法和析构函数](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/0s71x931(v=vs.100))、 [清理非托管资源](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged)和 [重写 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Finalize Methods and Destructors](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/0s71x931(v=vs.100)), [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged), and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).

summary.span: 使枚举数前进到队列中的下一条消息。

span.span: Advances the enumerator to the next message in the queue.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool MoveNext() cil managed
abstract member MoveNext : unit -> bool override this.MoveNext : unit -> bool

summary.span: 如果当前队列中有下一条可用的消息，则使枚举数前进到该消息。

span.span: Advances the enumerator to the next message in the queue, if one is currently available.

returns.span: 如果枚举器已成功推进到下一条消息，则为 ；如果枚举器已传递到队列的末尾，则为 。

span.span: if the enumerator was successfully advanced to the next message; if the enumerator has reached the end of the queue.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果队列中没有消息，则此重载立即返回。This overload returns immediately if there is no message in the queue. 还有另一个重载，用于等待 消息到达的指定。There is another overload that waits a specified for a message to arrive. 如果消息当前不可用，因为队列为空，或者您已移动到集合中的最后一个元素之后，则 返回 `false` 到调用方法。If a message is not currently available because the queue is empty or because you have moved beyond the last element in the collection, returns `false` to the calling method. 创建时，枚举器在概念上放置在队列的第一条消息之前，第一次调用会将 队列的第一条消息引入视图中。Upon creation, an enumerator is conceptually positioned before the first message of the queue, and the first call to brings the first message of the queue into view.

exception.span: 引发了消息队列特定的异常。

span.span: An exception specific to Message Queuing was thrown.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool MoveNext(valuetype System.TimeSpan timeout) cil managed
Public Function MoveNext (timeout As TimeSpan) As Boolean

param.name: timeout
param.span: 枚举数位于队列的末尾时，等待消息变得可用的 。

span.span: The to wait for a message to be available if the enumerator is positioned at the end of the queue.

summary.span: 使枚举数前进到队列中的下一条消息。

span.span: Advances the enumerator to the next message in the queue.

summary.span: 如果枚举数位于队列的末尾，则 将一直等到消息可用或给定 timeout 到期为止。

span.span: If the enumerator is positioned at the end of the queue, waits until a message is available or the given timeout expires.

returns.span: 如果枚举数成功地前进到下一条消息，为 ；如果枚举数已经到达队列的末尾，并且在 参数所指定的时间内没有消息变得可用，则为 。

span.span: if the enumerator successfully advanced to the next message; if the enumerator has reached the end of the queue and a message does not become available within the time specified by the parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果队列中没有消息，或者游标已到达队列的末尾，则此重载将等待。This overload waits if there is no message in the queue or if the cursor has reached the end of the queue. 如果消息当前不可用，因为队列为空，或者您已移动到集合中的最后一个元素之后，则将 等待指定的超时。If a message is not currently available because the queue is empty or because you have moved beyond the last element in the collection, waits the specified timeout. 如果游标已在队列的末尾，则 仅在 `true` 新消息到达指定的时间间隔内时才返回，其优先级低于当前队列中的所有消息，并置于队列的末尾。If the cursor is already at the end of the queue, only returns `true` if the new message arrives within the specified time interval, has lower priority than all messages currently in the queue and is placed at the end of the queue. 如果队列中没有更多的消息，则不会立即返回没有参数的重载。An overload with no parameter returns immediately if no further messages are in the queue. 创建时，枚举器在概念上定位在枚举的第一条消息之前，第一次调用会 将枚举的第一条消息引入视图中。Upon creation, an enumerator is conceptually positioned before the first message of the enumeration, and the first call to brings the first message of the enumeration into view.

exception.span: 为 timeout 参数指定的值无效。

span.span: The value specified for the timeout parameter is invalid.

exception.span: 它可能表示负数。

span.span: It might represent a negative number.

exception.span: 引发了消息队列特定的异常。

span.span: An exception specific to Message Queuing was thrown.
-or-

exception.span: 超时已过期。

span.span: The timeout has expired.

summary.span: 从队列中移除当前消息并将该消息返回给调用应用程序。

span.span: Removes the current message from the queue and returns the message to the calling application.

summary.span: 移除消息即从队列中删除该消息。

span.span: Removing the message deletes it from the queue.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅当 使用检索到实例时，才适用为这些重载描述的行为 。The behavior described for these overloads is applicable only if the instance is retrieved by using the . 不要使用 来检索实例， 因为此方法已弃用。Do not use to retrieve an instance of as this method has been deprecated.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Messaging.Message RemoveCurrent() cil managed

summary.span: 从事务性或非事务性队列中移除当前消息，并将该消息返回给调用应用程序。

span.span: Removes the current message from a transactional or non-transactional queue and returns the message to the calling application.

summary.span: 对于消息到达队列的用时没有超时指定。

span.span: There is no timeout specified for a message to arrive in the queue.

returns.span: ，它引用队列中可用的第一条消息。

span.span: A that references the first message available in the queue.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 移除并返回光标当前位置处的消息。 removes and returns the message at the cursor's current location. 如果使用队列日志记录，删除消息将导致副本保留在日记队列中，就像 该类的 方法一样。If you are using queue journaling, removing the message causes a copy to be kept in the journal queue, just as the class's method does. 删除当前消息时，光标将移到下一条消息。When you remove the current message, the cursor is moved to the next message. 调用后无需调用 。You do not have to call after calling . 如果在事务队列中调用此重载，则消息队列将创建单个内部事务。If you call this overload on a transactional queue, Message Queuing creates a single internal transaction.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Messaging.Message RemoveCurrent(class System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction transaction) cil managed
Public Function RemoveCurrent (transaction As MessageQueueTransaction) As Message

param.name: transaction
param.span: 指定从中移除消息的事务的 对象。

span.span: The object that specifies the transaction in which the message will be removed.

summary.span: 从事务性队列中移除当前消息，并将该消息返回给调用应用程序。

span.span: Removes the current message from a transactional queue and returns the message to the calling application.

summary.span: 对于消息到达队列的用时没有超时指定。

span.span: There is no timeout specified for a message to arrive in the queue.

returns.span: ，它引用队列中可用的第一条消息。

span.span: A that references the first message available in the queue.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用由参数定义的内部事务上下文，在游标的当前位置移除并返回消息 `transaction` 。 removes and returns the message at the cursor's current location, using the internal transaction context defined by the `transaction` parameter. 如果使用队列日志记录，删除消息将导致副本保留在日记队列中，就像 该类的 方法一样。If you are using queue journaling, removing the message causes a copy to be kept in the journal queue, just as the class's method does. 使用事务性队列时，事务的回滚会导致调用所删除的任何消息 返回到队列。When working with transactional queues, a rollback of a transaction causes any messages removed by a call to to be returned to the queue. 在提交事务之前，删除操作不可逆。The removal is not irreversible until the transaction is committed. 删除当前消息时，光标将移到下一条消息。When you remove the current message, the cursor is moved to the next message. 调用后无需调用 。You do not have to call after calling .

exception.span: 参数为 。

span.span: The parameter is .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Messaging.Message RemoveCurrent(valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransactionType transactionType) cil managed
Public Function RemoveCurrent (transactionType As MessageQueueTransactionType) As Message

param.name: transactionType
param.span: 值之一，它描述与消息关联的事务上下文的类型。

span.span: One of the values, describing the type of transaction context to associate with the message.

summary.span: 从队列中移除当前消息并将该消息返回给调用应用程序。

span.span: Removes the current message from a queue and returns the message to the calling application.

summary.span: 对于消息到达队列的用时没有超时指定。

span.span: There is no timeout specified for a message to arrive in the queue.

returns.span: ，它引用队列中可用的第一条消息。

span.span: A that references the first message available in the queue.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用由参数定义的事务上下文，在游标的当前位置移除并返回消息 `transactionType` 。 removes and returns the message at the cursor's current location, using a transaction context defined by the `transactionType` parameter. `Automatic` `transactionType` 如果已存在附加到要用于接收消息的线程的外部事务上下文，请为参数指定。Specify `Automatic` for the `transactionType` parameter if there is already an external transaction context attached to the thread that you want to use to receive the message. 指定 `Single` 是否要以单个内部事务的形式接收消息。Specify `Single` if you want to receive the message as a single internal transaction. 您可以指定 `None` 是否要在事务上下文之外接收来自事务性队列的消息。You can specify `None` if you want to receive a message from a transactional queue outside of a transaction context. 如果使用队列日志记录，删除消息将导致副本保留在日记队列中，就像 该类的 方法一样。If you are using queue journaling, removing the message causes a copy to be kept in the journal queue, just as the class's method does. 使用事务性队列时，事务的回滚会导致调用所删除的任何消息 返回到队列。When working with transactional queues, a rollback of a transaction causes any messages removed by a call to to be returned to the queue. 在提交事务之前，删除操作不可逆。The removal is not irreversible until the transaction is committed. 删除当前消息时，光标将移到下一条消息。When you remove the current message, the cursor is moved to the next message. 调用后无需调用 。You do not have to call after calling .

exception.span: 参数不是 成员之一。

span.span: The parameter is not one of the members.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Messaging.Message RemoveCurrent(valuetype System.TimeSpan timeout) cil managed
Public Function RemoveCurrent (timeout As TimeSpan) As Message

param.name: timeout
param.span: 等待消息到达队列的时间间隔。

span.span: The interval of time to wait for a message to arrive in the queue.

summary.span: 从队列中移除当前消息并将该消息返回给调用应用程序。

span.span: Removes the current message from the queue and returns the message to the calling application.

summary.span: 如果有要移除的消息，该方法将立即返回该消息。

span.span: If there is a message to remove, the method returns it immediately.

summary.span: 否则，该方法在指定的超时内等待新消息到达。

span.span: Otherwise, the method waits the specified timeout for a new message to arrive.

returns.span: ，它引用队列中可用的第一条消息。

span.span: A that references the first message available in the queue.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 移除并返回光标当前位置处的消息。 removes and returns the message at the cursor's current location. 如果游标位于队列的末尾，则该方法的重载将一直等待，直到有可用的消息或参数指定的间隔 `timeout` 过期。If the cursor is at the end of the queue, this overload of the method waits until a message is available or the interval specified by the `timeout` parameter has expired. 如果使用队列日志记录，删除消息将导致副本保留在日记队列中，就像 该类的 方法一样。If you are using queue journaling, removing the message causes a copy to be kept in the journal queue, just as the class's method does. 删除当前消息时，光标将移到下一条消息。When you remove the current message, the cursor is moved to the next message. 调用后无需调用 。You do not have to call after calling . 如果在事务队列中调用此重载，则消息队列将创建单个内部事务。If you call this overload on a transactional queue, Message Queuing creates a single internal transaction.

exception.span: 为 参数指定的值无效。

span.span: The value specified for the parameter is invalid.

exception.span: 超时已过期。

span.span: The timeout has expired.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Messaging.Message RemoveCurrent (TimeSpan timeout, System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction transaction);
.method public hidebysig instance class System.Messaging.Message RemoveCurrent(valuetype System.TimeSpan timeout, class System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction transaction) cil managed
Public Function RemoveCurrent (timeout As TimeSpan, transaction As MessageQueueTransaction) As Message

param.name: timeout
param.span: 等待消息被移除的时间间隔。

span.span: The interval of time to wait for the message to be removed.

param.name: transaction
param.span: 为消息指定事务上下文的 对象。

span.span: The object that specifies the transaction context for the message.

summary.span: 从事务性队列中移除当前消息，并将该消息返回给调用应用程序。

span.span: Removes the current message from a transactional queue and returns the message to the calling application.

summary.span: 如果有要移除的消息，该方法将立即返回该消息。

span.span: If there is a message to remove, the method returns it immediately.

summary.span: 否则，该方法在指定的超时内等待新消息到达。

span.span: Otherwise, the method waits the specified timeout for a new message to arrive.

returns.span: ，它引用队列中可用的第一条消息。

span.span: A that references the first message available in the queue.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 移除并返回光标当前位置处的消息。 removes and returns the message at the cursor's current location. 如果游标位于队列的末尾，则该方法的重载将一直等待，直到有可用的消息或参数指定的间隔 `timeout` 过期。If the cursor is at the end of the queue, this overload of the method waits until a message is available or the interval specified by the `timeout` parameter has expired. 使用事务性队列时，事务的回滚会导致调用所删除的任何消息 返回到队列。When working with transactional queues, a rollback of a transaction causes any messages removed by a call to to be returned to the queue. 在提交事务之前，删除操作不可逆。The removal is not irreversible until the transaction is committed. 如果使用队列日志记录，删除消息将导致副本保留在日记队列中，就像 该类的 方法一样。If you are using queue journaling, removing the message causes a copy to be kept in the journal queue, just as the class's method does. 删除当前消息时，光标将移到下一条消息。When you remove the current message, the cursor is moved to the next message. 调用后无需调用 。You do not have to call after calling .

span.span: The value specified for the parameter is invalid.

exception.span: 参数为 。

span.span: The parameter is .

exception.span: 超时已过期。

span.span: The timeout has expired.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Messaging.Message RemoveCurrent(valuetype System.TimeSpan timeout, valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransactionType transactionType) cil managed
Public Function RemoveCurrent (timeout As TimeSpan, transactionType As MessageQueueTransactionType) As Message

param.name: timeout
param.span: 等待消息被移除的时间间隔。

span.span: The interval of time to wait for the message to be removed.

param.name: transactionType
param.span: 值之一，它描述与消息关联的事务上下文的类型。

span.span: One of the values, describing the type of transaction context to associate with the message.

summary.span: 从队列中移除当前消息并将该消息返回给调用应用程序。

span.span: Removes the current message from a queue and returns the message to the calling application.

summary.span: 如果有要移除的消息，该方法将立即返回该消息。

span.span: If there is a message to remove, the method returns it immediately.

summary.span: 否则，该方法在指定的超时内等待新消息到达。

span.span: Otherwise, the method waits the specified timeout for a new message to arrive.

returns.span: ，它引用队列中可用的第一条消息。

span.span: A that references the first message available in the queue.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用由参数定义的事务上下文，在游标的当前位置移除并返回消息 `transactionType` 。 removes and returns the message at the cursor's current location, using a transaction context defined by the `transactionType` parameter. 如果游标位于队列的末尾，则该方法的重载将一直等待，直到有可用的消息或参数指定的间隔 `timeout` 过期。If the cursor is at the end of the queue, this overload of the method waits until a message is available or the interval specified by the `timeout` parameter has expired. `Automatic` `transactionType` 如果已存在附加到要用于接收消息的线程的外部事务上下文，请为参数指定。Specify `Automatic` for the `transactionType` parameter if there is already an external transaction context attached to the thread that you want to use to receive the message. 指定 `Single` 是否要以单个内部事务的形式接收消息。Specify `Single` if you want to receive the message as a single internal transaction. 您可以指定 `None` 是否要在事务上下文之外接收来自事务性队列的消息。You can specify `None` if you want to receive a message from a transactional queue outside of a transaction context. 如果使用队列日志记录，删除消息将导致副本保留在日记队列中，就像 该类的 方法一样。If you are using queue journaling, removing the message causes a copy to be kept in the journal queue, just as the class's method does. 使用事务性队列时，事务的回滚会导致调用所删除的任何消息 返回到队列。When working with transactional queues, a rollback of a transaction causes any messages removed by a call to to be returned to the queue. 在提交事务之前，删除操作不可逆。The removal is not irreversible until the transaction is committed. 删除当前消息时，光标将移到下一条消息。When you remove the current message, the cursor is moved to the next message. 调用后无需调用 。You do not have to call after calling .

exception.span: 为 参数指定的值无效。

span.span: The value specified for the parameter is invalid.

exception.span: 超时已过期。

span.span: The timeout has expired.

exception.span: 参数不是 成员之一。

span.span: The parameter is not one of the members.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Reset() cil managed
abstract member Reset : unit -> unit override this.Reset : unit -> unit

summary.span: 重置当前枚举数，使其指向队列开头。

span.span: Resets the current enumerator so it points to the head of the queue.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 枚举器只能向前移动。An enumerator can only move in a forward direction. 使用此方法可以在队列的开头重新开始。Use this method to start over at the beginning of the queue. 调用后 ，光标指向第一条消息。After calling , the cursor points to the first message. 在调用后，您无需调用将 游标向前移动到队列中的第一条消息。You do not need to call after calling to move the cursor forward to the first message in the queue.

exception.span: 您在第一次调用 之前访问了此属性。

span.span: You accessed this property before the first call to .
